divs: Sighting DetailsWas the height of a jetliner. Looked like a steady moving dull yellow ball, about the size of about 2-3 Jupiters (the current one visable in the evening western sky. No strobes, or any type running lights what-so-ever. Smooth, and steady speed. No residue, ie: a meteor burning. Stayed horizontal in reference to the ground. I didn't see it fade in the distance, because when I went to get field glasses, it was gone when I returned. Thanks
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hardyston
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Looked out my picture window viewing west, saw dull dark yellow ball with steady jet type speed move smoothly. No lights what-so-ever . Possibly the height of a jetliner.
